episodes.title: Leah & Mike with Claire Headley: When Scientology Tried to Get Jim Carrey
episodes.description:
An update on things in the world to begin as we have been "missing" for a few weeks. 

We are joined by Claire Headley to discuss the efforts made to suck Jim Carrey into scientology. It was a strange coincidence that this even came up recently, and we talk about this and the efforts to circumvent the Hubbard "tech" on dealing with "illegal pc's." We also cover some crazy scientology celebrity stories and the lengths David Miscavige goes to in order to woo his biggest star, Tom Cruise.

To find copies of the documents mentioned in this episode visit my blog: https://www.mikerindersblog.org/leah-mike-when-scientology-tried-to-get-jim-carrey/

episodes.title: Scientology Indicted for Tax Evasion
episodes.description:
After a lengthy investigation, Hungarian authorities issued indictments and levied $1.7 million assessment against scientology in Budapest for engaging in a conspiracy to avoid paying tax on income from the sale of books and services. We talk to Peter Bonyai, who has been instrumental in bringing about action against scientology abuses in Hungary. With common laws throughout the European Union, and additional prosecution of scientology for data protection law violations, we discuss the future for scientology and how individuals can bring about change.

See more at my blog: https://www.mikerindersblog.org/scientology-indicted-for-tax-evasion/

episodes.title: Scientology's Big "Blood on Your Hands" Lie Exposed
episodes.description:
Breaking down the facts that have now been revealed proving scientology was lying (and KNEW it) when they claimed Leah Remini and I had "incited" the murder of a scientology security guard in Australia in 2019. They had ALL the facts, but until now, they had remained secret. Their brazen lying relied on the documents that have now come to light never being public. 

This is yet another example of Fair Game.

The documents referred to in this video are available at my blog: https://www.mikerindersblog.org/leah-and-mike-discuss-scientologys-big-lie/

episodes.title: Rick Moxon
episodes.description:
High level scientologist and lawyer Kendrick (Rick) Moxon is an operative who has been carrying out scientology Fair Game activities since the mid-1970's, and he continues to this day. He was recently caught trying to frame Leah Remini for "inciting violence" against scientology but it backfired spectacularly.

The documents referred to in this video are available at my blog: https://www.mikerindersblog.org/new-leah-mike-video-scientologys-fair-game-poster-child-caught-trying-to-frame-leah/

episodes.title: Scientology Violating Minimum Wage Law -- with Phil Jones
episodes.description:
Scientology had to settle claims made for violations of the minimum wage laws in Quebec, Canada. They have not changed their policies with respect to paying staff and Sea Org members, so continue to break the law. This may be the case in other jurisdictions too.

Phil Jones, of the "Call Me" billboard joins me to discuss the state of scientology in Canada and we look at the laws.

You can reach Phil at: https://stopscientologydisconnection.com/contact/

Also see new undercover investigation of Quebec Org that aired last night -- transcript is at Tony Ortega's blog: https://tonyortega.substack.com/p/undercover-investigation-scientologys?utm_campaign=email-post&r=1lqmg0&utm_source=substack&utm_medium=email

The documents referred to in this video are available at my blog: https://www.mikerindersblog.org/scientology-violating-canadian-minimum-wage-laws/

episodes.title: Scientology Safe-pointing with Alex Barnes-Ross
episodes.description:
Recent events with the Mayor of East Grinstead taking a check from scientology and attending Tom Cruise movie premiere highlight the efforts of scientology to build a wall of protection for itself. Elected officials and law enforcement are rubbing shoulders with an organization actively engaged in human trafficking and other abuses. They should know who they are enabling. Alex Barnes-Ross (Apostate Alex) has been digging in and exposing the facts to the world. 

Check out Alex's excellent website here: https://www.scientologybusiness.com/

You can also find him on X: https://twitter.com/ApostateAlex

To find copies of the documents mentioned in this episode visit my blog: https://www.mikerindersblog.org/leah-mike-talk-scientology-safepointing-with-alex-barnes-ross/

episodes.title: Scientology Safepointing Clearwater
episodes.description:
Scientology is working hard to "safepoint" the Clearwater community. They rolled out their big gun -- the wealthiest scientologist in the area, Trish Duggan to feature in the latest edition of Tampa Bay magazine. The publisher/editors of this magazine are helping to try to make scientology "normal" in Clearwater, hosting a joint event at the Ft Harrison hotel, while abuses are ongoing in that very building. I name all the enablers listed in the magazine in the article on my blog, along with all the images included in this video. 

https://www.mikerindersblog.org/

episodes.description: Scientology is at it again TODAY. Their latest efforts are just as insane as those that have preceded them. Fair Game is alive and ...

episodes.title: Scientology Stacks Their Phony "Arbitration" Deck
episodes.description:
The Headleys and I dive into the Alice in Wonderland world of scientology "arbitration" -- and in particular the "arbitrators" scientology chose for Valerie Haney's recent nightmare experience. We know them all well. 

For more information on this episode and the subject of scientology "arbitration" in general, visit my blog: https://www.mikerindersblog.org/scientology-stacks-the-phony-arbitration-deck/

episodes.title: Cruise & Beckham: Behind the Scenes
episodes.description: The Headleys and I talk about the history of Tom Cruise efforts to woo David and Victoria Beckham and why this was considered so important and why Cruise failed so miserably.

episodes.title: Secret Scientology Document: Fair Game Proof
episodes.description:
See the proof of scientology's fair game harassment activities as Leah and Mike dissect a secret scientology program written to intimidate a whistleblower into silence.

Find the documents and the Hubbard references here: https://www.mikerindersblog.org/?p=2620761&preview=true

episodes.title: Scientology Declares Danny Masterson a Suppressive Person
episodes.description:
Breaking news from Jeff Augustine, who joins Marc & Claire and me to talk about the latest in the Masterson saga.

See Jeff's story at Scientology Money Project: https://scientologymoneyproject.com/2023/10/20/sources-scientology-has-declared-danny-masterson-a-suppressive-person/

episodes.title: Victim is a Dirty Word in Scientology
episodes.description:
Leah and Mike explain how scientology views and treats victims of abuse and crimes and why it is so difficult to break the chains of indoctrination and agreement within the organization. 

To see copies of the documents referred to in this episode, go to mikerindersblog.org.

episodes.title: Leah & Mike interview Rosemary about elder abuse in scientology
episodes.description:
Following up from the two episodes Mike and Claire did with Rosemary's son, Mike Brown, Rosemary reached out to us and asked if she could speak. Hearing her experiences first-hand adds to the outrage of these abuses.

To see the letter referred to go to my blog: https://www.mikerindersblog.org/scientology-elder-abuse-part-2/

episodes.title: Scientology Elder Abuse with Mike Brown Part 2
episodes.description: The horrifying first hand account of rampant elder abuse. Mike and Claire continue their chocking interview with Mike Brown.

episodes.title: Rampant, Horrifying Elder Abuse in Scientology
episodes.description:
Mike & Claire talk to Mike Brown about the horrific treatment of his mother, now 77, in the Sea Org, and how, with the help of the Aftermath Foundation he managed to get her out.

The details of what was done to her (and others) will make you angry and wonder how this sort of blatant and widespread mistreatment is allowed to occur in a civilized society.

episodes.title: Leah & Mike Live Q&A
episodes.description: Submit your questions and we will try to answer as many as we can!

episodes.title: How Scientology Covers Up Crimes
episodes.description:
Leah & Mike expose the lies of scientology claiming they have no policy preventing anyone from reporting crimes to law enforcement. Read the policies for yourself and hear how scientology prevents perpetrators of crimes from facing justice.  

See the full documents at Mikerindersblog.org.

episodes.title: Leah & Mike Talk Masterson Verdict
episodes.description:
Leah was in court for the Masterson sentencing today and is going to bring her unique perspective as to how it unfolded.

See the letter from Jane Doe 1's mother at Leah's Substack: https://leahremini.substack.com/p/david-miscavige-knew-danny-masterson

episodes.title: Leah & Mike Are Back!
episodes.description:
Let the fun begin again! @leahremini and @mikerinder are back, talking all things scientology. This time, we have some scientology documents that you need to hear about.

You can find full copies of the documents we reference in this video at mikerindersblog.org
